nodes.text: This Clone Captain was a clone trooper captain who served in the Grand Army of the Republic during the Clone Wars. The clone participated in the First Battle of Geonosis alongside Jedi Grand Master Yoda and was present in the forward command center during the battle. He ordered all quadrants to move to sector 5-1-5 after receiving orders from Master Yoda.

This Clone Captain was one of the many clone troopers created on Kamino based on the DNA of bounty hunter Jango Fett with the purpose of serving the Galactic Republic as a soldier. In 22 BBY, he participated in the First Battle of Geonosis where he was stationed in a forward command center along with Jedi Grand Master Yoda. Yoda ordered all fire be concentrated on the nearest starship, so he ordered all quadrants to sector 5-1-5. Following this, the Republic's SPHA-Ts fired on a core ship.
This clone trooper captain wore phase I clone trooper armor with red markings to signify his rank.
